moduleDescription: Bina root ke Kali Linux tools use karna - NetHunter Rootless installation aur setup

content.intro: NetHunter ek mobile penetration testing platform hai jo Android devices pe Kali Linux tools run karta hai. Rootless version bina root ke kaam karta hai.

sections.heading: NetHunter Rootless Kyu Use Kare?
sections.text:
â€¢ Bina root ke Kali Linux tools use kar sakte hain
â€¢ Phone ki warranty void nahi hoti
â€¢ Safe aur secure - system files touch nahi karta
â€¢ Portable penetration testing lab
â€¢ Professional ethical hacking tools access

sections.heading: System Requirements
sections.text:
â€¢ Android 7.0+ (API level 24+)
â€¢ 4GB+ RAM (recommended)
â€¢ 8GB+ free storage
â€¢ Stable internet connection
â€¢ Termux app installed

commands.explanation: Termux ko latest version mein update karta hai

commands.command: pkg install wget curl proot tar -y
commands.explanation: NetHunter installation ke liye zaroori packages
Storage access permission deta hai

content.intro: Step by step NetHunter Rootless install karna seekhiye. Installation process time lagti hai lekin result worth hai.

commands.explanation: Official NetHunter installation script download karta hai
Installation script ko executable permission deta hai

commands.explanation: NetHunter installation start karta hai (30-60 minutes lagenge)

â€¢ Internet connection stable rakhe

commands.explanation: Kali Linux chroot environment start karta hai
Kali package repositories update karta hai
Installed packages ko latest version mein upgrade karta hai

sections.heading: Environment Variables

commands.explanation: Bash configuration file edit karta hai

sections.text:
Bashrc mein ye lines add kariye:

export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin
export TERM=xterm-256color
alias ll='ls -la'
alias la='ls -A'
alias l='ls -CF'

content.intro: Graphical interface ke liye VNC server setup karna. VNC se aap Kali Linux ko GUI mode mein use kar sakte hain.

commands.explanation: Lightweight VNC server install karta hai
XFCE desktop environment install karta hai
VNC connection ke liye password set karta hai
VNC server port 1 pe 1024x768 resolution mein start karta hai

sections.heading: Startup Script Configuration

commands.explanation: VNC startup configuration edit karta hai

sections.text:
xstartup file mein ye content add kariye:

#!/bin/bash
xrdb $HOME/.Xresources
startxfce4 &

commands.explanation: VNC server ko stop karta hai
Running VNC sessions dikhata hai
VNC server different resolution mein restart karta hai

sections.heading: VNC Client Apps
sections.text:
Mobile pe VNC connect karne ke liye ye apps use kariye:

â€¢ VNC Viewer (RealVNC) - Free aur reliable

â€¢ MultiVNC - Advanced features

Connection Details:
â€¢ Address: localhost:5901
â€¢ Password: Jo aapne set kiya hai

content.intro: Common issues aur unke solutions, performance optimization tips aur best practices.

sections.heading: Common Issues & Solutions
sections.text:
Issue 1: NetHunter start nahi ho raha
Solution: Termux restart kariye aur phir nethunter command run kariye

Issue 2: VNC connect nahi ho raha
Solution: VNC server restart kariye aur port check kariye

Issue 3: Tools install nahi ho rahe
Solution: apt update run kariye aur internet connection check kariye

commands.explanation: Package cache clear kar ke space free karta hai
Unused packages remove karta hai
Temporary files delete karta hai
NetHunter installation ka backup banata hai
VNC configuration backup karta hai

sections.heading: Best Practices
sections.text:
â€¢ Regular updates karte rahe: apt update && apt upgrade
â€¢ VNC server use ke baad stop kar de: vncserver -kill :1
â€¢ Unnecessary tools install na kare - space bachaye
â€¢ Important data ka backup rakhe
â€¢ Battery optimization disable kare Termux ke liye
â€¢ Stable internet connection use kare

sections.heading: Useful Aliases

commands.explanation: Useful shortcuts add karte hain

sections.text:
Bashrc mein ye aliases add kariye:

alias nh='nethunter'
alias update='apt update && apt upgrade'
alias vncstart='vncserver :1 -geometry 1024x768'
alias vncstop='vncserver -kill :1'
alias ll='ls -la'
alias ..='cd ..'

sections.heading: Automation Scripts

commands.explanation: Automated reconnaissance script banata hai

sections.text:
Auto recon script content:

#!/bin/bash
echo "Starting Auto Recon for $1"
nmap -sS -O $1 > nmap_scan.txt
nikto -h $1 > nikto_scan.txt
dirb http://$1 > dirb_scan.txt
echo "Recon completed. Check output files."

content.intro: Professional penetration testing methodology - systematic approach se security assessment karna. Industry standards aur best practices.

sections.heading: PTES (Penetration Testing Execution Standard)
sections.text:
PTES ke 7 phases:

1. Pre-engagement Interactions
2. Intelligence Gathering
3. Threat Modeling
4. Vulnerability Analysis
5. Exploitation
6. Post Exploitation
7. Reporting

commands.explanation: OWASP ZAP web application security scanner
OWASP testing checklist download karta hai

sections.heading: NIST Cybersecurity Framework
sections.text:
NIST Framework ke 5 functions:

â€¢ Identify - Asset inventory aur risk assessment
â€¢ Protect - Safeguards aur security controls
â€¢ Detect - Monitoring aur detection systems
â€¢ Respond - Incident response procedures
â€¢ Recover - Recovery planning aur improvements

commands.explanation: Modular reconnaissance framework

sections.heading: Mobile Malware Analysis
sections.text:
Mobile malware analysis steps:

1. Static Analysis - Code review without execution
2. Dynamic Analysis - Runtime behavior monitoring
3. Network Analysis - Traffic monitoring
4. Behavioral Analysis - System interactions

Common Android malware types:
â€¢ Banking Trojans
â€¢ SMS Trojans
â€¢ Adware
â€¢ Spyware
â€¢ Ransomware
